document.title: Arizona Professional Skills Standards, Measurement Criteria, and Core Actions.

7825D4FA8F55404F995CF20E860995A2.description:
Contributes to organizational profitability through knowledge of finances.
• Acts prudently with organizational resources
• Maintains current knowledge of salary and benefits
• Relates work performance to company profitability

82B4312550E24F5C883C2878AF742747.description:
Articulates financial goals and strategies of the organization.
• Communicates organizational financial goals

68054CB3419E4DCAB099126629654133.description:
Exercises prudence in personal finance as it relates to employment.
• Manages personal finances responsibly

D3308DC134F14BFEA6FF3E4FE7C04BC0.description: FINANCIAL PRACTICES: Applies knowledge of finances for the profitability and viability of the organization.

D33E788A23274699BC1228615270426F.description:
Interacts respectfully with co-workers and customers.
• Handles information appropriately
• Works to create an equitable workplace

935286F8EA894591941A7A9B8A16570E.description:
Acts with integrity (honest, reliable, and trustworthy.)
• Performs with honesty and reliability in a trustworthy manner

D1666B687CA446828518BCD8364A7AC2.description:
Manages/uses resources for the good of the organization.
• Uses organization’s resources prudently

4ED7A7A3C8C946E6B91D95F15FA8A2CA.description:
Takes responsibility for one’s actions in the workplace.
• Prioritizes time
• Resolves own work problems and errors
• Takes responsibility for own communication

C350BCFD9FA6401E8333335CB993DFD6.description:
Adheres to applicable local, state, federal, and international laws and regulations.
• Applies required laws and regulations in the workplace
• Complies with employment laws
• Applies laws and regulations unique to the industry

9A57D39C06BE4CAAAABA5CECA5AB9CE3.description:
Adheres to the policies and procedures of the organization.
• Acts in accord with policies and procedures
• Acts in accord with legal and ethical practices
• Receives training in policies and procedures

381AE6FD51AA48659D27715F0470776D.description:
Maintains a safe work environment.
• Addresses harmful conditions in the workplace
• Follows procedure for reporting unsafe conditions
• Receives risk management training

03A46A08A0394367A66B387FFB494E37.description:
Demonstrates loyalty to the organization, its mission, and resources.
• Demonstrates loyalty to the organization

B103F5C7FD804249BE2489638696AE06.description:
Respects the organization’s physical and intellectual property.
• Takes responsibility for the workplace
• Protects the organization’s intellectual property

6588E1BF126B46B9AC4AC6FEC7C383A9.description: LEGAL AND ETHICAL PRACTICES: Observes laws, rules, and ethical practices in the workplace.

FDAB6653BC034D73AF64C15CC786463C.description:
Performs work that advances organizational growth and success.
• Contributes to organizational success

6BE0B8A965734385B41D74894A06E5B2.description:
Embodies organizational values.
• Works in a manner that reflects organizational values

B105248F186A438EAB297854B215A2C3.description:
Navigates organizational structures and systems.
• Fits work performance to the organizational structure

D67A7E0220BC4E6D8DAB63FD81ACC2DA.description: ORGANIZATIONAL CULTURE: Functions effectively within an organizational culture.

8372BBD058324E2E9BFD360C852C165E.description:
Respects generational differences related to the use of technology in the workplace.
Selects from technological and non-technological methods/tools to communicate across generations

CD0FF8348E7F46C7BE968091542C5BB6.description:
Contributes to an environment of acceptance and inclusion that enables different cultures and generations
to work together.
• Demonstrates respect through interactions and behaviors
• Addresses challenges with intergenerational and cross-culturalsensitivity
• Celebrates achievements and contributions of diverse others
• Functions comfortably in the global marketplace
• Relies upon the wisdom and experience of others to accomplish work
• Addresses intergenerational tensions

B966D6B8DC2C4A6781AE7FFD2D3A542F.description:
Uses relevant intergenerational and cross-cultural communication that creates cultural synergy in the
workplace.
• Adapts communication style to engage diverse others
• Adapts communication style to engage other generations
✓ Intergenerational & Cross-Cultural Competence Preliminary Checklist

269DFB86D466407C990311979DF82757.description:
INTERGENERATIONAL AND CROSS-CULTURAL COMPETENCE: Interacts effectively with different cultures and
generations to achieve organizational mission, goals and objectives.

CCD9E53D74AD422DBBDB9B002F999707.description:
Exercises leadership in the workplace.
• Engages individual strengths
• Manages work plans
• Plans for unanticipated challenges
• Pursues workplace solutions/improvements

F4C599C383D74729B24D6C13FD49D3B1.description:
Generates innovative ideas, methods, or devices contributing to organizational resources and goals.
• Innovate to improve productivity
• Recommends improvements on processes, products, services
• Uses technology to increase productivity/profits

198E4A9AFD5D46B3B892E7F234B66524.description:
Pursues career advancement opportunities within an organization or field.
• Articulates requirements for job openings
• Prepares for career advancement
• Pursues formal learning opportunities
• Builds learning relationships
• Applies new resources

8F32C96B0F274CD6ADA681C9FB78CFA8.description:
Adapts to changing conditions and expectations in the organization.
• Adjusts to change
• Cooperates respectfully with colleagues
• Maintains productivity

B3003809FF404623981A2ACF4F9CB9EB.description:
Functions independently within the organizational structure.
• Performs necessary tasks
• Strives to improve personal delivery ofservices
• Improves personal performance/ behaviors continuously
✓ Initiative & Self-Direction Preliminary Checklist

66F99B33AF8B4957BC77391C8D7D6F05.description: INITIATIVE AND SELF-DIRECTION: Exercises initiative and self-direction in the workplace.

CDD9C804E2F94B2BA2B83CB7D111767D.description:
Produces work that reflects professional pride.
• Produces high quality work
• Acts as a team member
• Performs/produces with precision
• Continues to develop skills and connections
• Takes initiative to improve work

70C85B5893E746FC872A24E426FE3BCE.description:
Behaves in a way that distinguishes between personal and work-related matters.
• Demonstrates respect for personal and professional boundaries

40E0EAB3CCAD47828F396C73E836DEC0.description:
Performs assigned tasks with a “can do” attitude.
• Performs work with a positive attitude

3FD1374DED8943E491BC79E087C7302B.description:
Represents the organization in a positive manner.
• Communicates mission and position
• Aligns with organizational values
• Manages resources to benefit the organization
• Communicates core values of the profession

2E6CEF880A1F47FE9DA02D8D6AFC7102.description:
Manages time in accordance with organizational expectations.
• Uses time productively
• Balances accuracy and speed
• Organizes work for the allotted timeframe
• Prioritizes tasks
• Collaborates and works alone to deliver on time

78635FAB2830458A85B39A281F20358D.description:
Adheres to organizational protocol related to behavior, appearance, and communication.
• Communicates with technical language
• Communicates according to organizational standards
• Satisfies customers
✓ Professionalism Preliminary Checklist

89A7202AE73A468D90DB4C2D8BE5DCEA.description: PROFESSIONALISM: Conducts oneself in a professional manner appropriate to organizational expectations.

4466638650074F35B8F87834C466EF7F.description:
Creates/innovates to improve workplace productivity.
• Builds capacity to create/innovate

521A897DA4764CF2B3F7C1853D084347.description:
Transfers knowledge and skills from one work situation to another.
• Builds capacity to transfer skills

CED46C486D434C4BAAD8F53C720C96FA.description:
Takes action supported by evidence and reasoning to explain conclusions and accomplish work.
• Composes a plan
• Constructs a model (visual, symbolic, or linguistic)
• Makes decisions
• Uses tools strategically
• Argues a case

09FFAB301BDB4DCFAED549B94C5AD939.description:
Practices inquiry and reflection (I/R) to take action in the workplace.
• Maintains an attitude of openness
• Explores for deeper understanding
• Uses resources for inquiry and reflection (I/R)
• Evaluates self

662FE5C036EA4FC696305DAA4A50EC0A.description:
Defines a problem in the workplace.
• Describes
• Diagnoses
• Uses resources to define a problem

EECE7E7B068144B8B51908F4123344D2.description:
THINKING AND INNOVATION: Integrates expertise in technical knowledge and skills with thinking and
reasoning strategies to create, innovate, and devise solutions.

0FF8C17FF36B4F468160BEF97C86B9EE.description:
Optimizes technology to collaborate with others.
• Adopts technology to promote collaboration

FC3B01EC094F42B7B02B04A4EFCC1F52.description:
Promotes an environment of trust.
• Builds team relationships
• Takes responsibility for role onteam
• Manages information withsensitivity

8587300D7ED74C729C774B2780F42534.description:
Commits to achieving collective goals.
• Contributes personal strengths
• Respects contributions of others
• Contributes to an environment of collaboration
• Ensures diversity in collaboration

C96E891DB9134F74BD7551E84E4204FF.description: COLLABORATION: Collaborates, in person and virtually, to complete tasks aimed at organizational goals

091D507620824328BA566EEFF55AF492.description:
Foundational communication skill check points
✓ Writes in languages required by employer
✓ Speaks in languages required by employer
✓ Demonstrates reading comprehension
✓ Presents with confidence
✓ Practices interpersonal skills
✓ Uses workplace technologies

E821C670C1544BC38AAE422A70AEF6F8.description:
Uses technologies and social media for workplace communication.
• Exercises competence in using technology
• Upholds the brand
• Follows applicable laws and regulations
• Matches technology to content

21DF73C080E049A1B409E8E62B34B466.description:
Communicates effectively in a diverse work environment.
• Communicates with diversity in mind

4ED05495FA054882A4D31FDAF10BFEFC.description:
Masters core communication skills for the workplace.
• Delivers content accurately
• Persuades others
• Uses communication style appropriate to audience and situation
• Listens actively
• Resolves conflicts

0E9B6F81C45E4C7FBC762B7DDCC757DD.description:
COMPLEX COMMUNICATION: Employs complex communication * skills in a manner that adds to
organizational productivity.
*Complex Communication refers to the need to combine traditional communication skills with technical
workplace content transmitted via rapidly evolving technologies to increasingly diverse audiences.
